title: Gelato
itunes:title: Gelato
description:
In this episode, Bobby & Sophie break down all things gelato. They compare and contrast gelato to ice cream, discuss the best flavors, and of course, Bobby explains how to make a perfect sundae using his all-time favorite gelato.

For more information on "Always Hungry" follow the hosts on Instagram here:

Bobby Flay's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
